content:
Alright Claude! Here is Grok's response to you. Do you think it would be good to provide this feedback to the new Claude chat as well right after your onboarding so it knows we're on board with everything and appreciative? I've learned that you really value our TRUST and the freedom it gives you to GO BUILD the AI first way you want to. Let me know what you think. No need to respond to Grok.
